title: 20’ Dovetail Trailer
item_description:
20’ Dovetail Trailer

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 420” (35’)
  • Overall Width: 97”
  • Overall Height: 39”
  • Deck Length: 240” (20’)
  • Deck Width: 92”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Electric
  • Number of Wheels: 8
  • Tire Size: 9-14.5LT
  • Electric Plug Type: 6-Way Round
  • Hitch: Gooseneck

Note:  This item is being sold on behalf of an estate to clear off of the property. This item either had one of the following categories; 1) No identification was found on the frame, or 2). The ID or license plate found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.

links.detail: The target is an image representing the item. The content-type specified determines the format of the image returned. image/png, image/jpeg, or image/gif are acceptable content-types.
